meanings.definition: A person who shares first place in a competition with another.
meanings.sent1: The cowinner of the race was thrilled to share the victory.
meanings.sent2: The two friends became cowinners of the contest.
meanings.sent3: At the awards ceremony, the cowinner did a little victory dance.
meanings.sent4: Being a cowinner felt like standing on top of the world.
meanings.sent5: The title of cowinner was a badge of honor.

meanings.definition: To share first place in a competition with another.
meanings.sent1: They decided to cowin the championship and celebrate together.
meanings.sent2: In the end, they cowinnered the talent show with their amazing performance.
meanings.sent3: The siblings cowinnered the game by working as a team.
meanings.sent4: The athletes cowinnered the race, crossing the finish line hand in hand.
meanings.sent5: To cowinner requires both skill and sportsmanship.
